title: An Introduction to Behavioural Ecology 4th c2012 Davies et al
description:
An Introduction to Behavioural Ecology, 4th Edition (c2012), textbook by Nicholas B. Davies, John R. Krebs & Stuart A. West.

TEXTBOOK INFO: Google these 2 keywords together: Wiley productCd-1405114169

AUDIENCE: Students of behavioural ecology, animal behaviour and evolutionary biology.

CONTENTS:
---------
1. Natural Selection, Ecology and Behaviour
2. Testing Hypotheses in Behavioural Ecology
3. Economic Decisions and the Individual
4. Predators versus Prey: Evolutionary Arms Races
5. Competing for Resources
6. Living in Groups
7. Sexual Selection, Sperm Competition and Sexual Conflict
8. Parental Care and Family Conflicts
9. Mating Systems
10. Sex Allocation
11. Social Behaviours: Altruism to Spite
12. Cooperation
13. Altruism and Conflict in the Social Insects
14. Communication and Signals
15. Conclusion
(detailed contents at website above)

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF.
